resources.string: Synchronisation of your account data between the watch application and this application
Data has been synced, you can now close this application

This application is a companion app, used only to log in the watch application. Nothing is collected anywhere in any way from this application.\n This phone app is only used to retrieve and send the login session\'s cookie to the watch application. The app is just a webview integrating the **HowLongToBeat** [website](https://howlongtobeat.com/).\n The watch application then store the session info locally on your device to keep you logged in.

The HLTBWearOS application is not an official application from HowLongToBeat. It is developed by **Cl√©mence Roumy**. 
 You can find me on : 
 - **Github** : [https://github.com/clemenceroumy](https://github.com/clemenceroumy) 
 - **Instagram** : [https://www.instagram.com/croumy/](https://www.instagram.com/croumy/) 
 
 If you want to give me a tip to support me, you can do it here [https://www.buymeacoffee.com/croumy](https://www.buymeacoffee.com/croumy)

The phone application is voluntarily not showed on your phone app list, because its supposed to be opened only by the watch application. To remove it, go to your phone settings and search for "HLTBWearOS".
